article_title: Half of Gaza's population is starving, warns UN
sentence: Movement  in  and  out  of  Gaza  has  been  heavily  restricted  since  7  October,  when  Hamas  fighters  broke  through  Israel's  heavily-guarded  perimeter  fence  -  killing  1,200  people  and  taking  240  hostages.

sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  Israel  has  killed  more  than  17,700  Gazans  in  its  retaliatory  campaign,  including  more  than  7,000  children.
